name: Beans R Mean
description:
This is a game about mutant jelly beans.

story: It was a cold day and we were experimenting with a new jelly bean flavor at the factory. There was a malfunction with the machine, the jelly beans started growing and then they started learning, then one day they became too strong to keep down and the Jelly beans broke out. 

The goal of the game is to kill as many Jelly Beans as possible.
 
This is my first FPS game so its not going to be a Triple-A title. :)

Enjoy!
